text: Kyoshi may refer to: *Kyoshi Takahama (1874–1959), Japanese poet *Kyoshi Miura (born 1961), Japanese cyclist *Avatar Kyoshi, a fictional character from Avatar: The Last Airbender *Kyōshi, a form of Japanese poetry *Kyōshi, a Japanese honorific ==See also== *Kiyoshi (disambiguation)
title: Kyoshi
